name: NontuberculousMycobacteriaInfectionPulmonaryTestsForMycobacteriumSpeciesInSputumSpecimenByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Nontuberculous Mycobacteria Infection, Pulmonary (Tests for Mycobacterium species in Sputum Specimen by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium species in sputum by culture or identification),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Mycobacterium sp, culture, isolate, sputum),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
